phrases: We will all do it together.
Please help us gather signatures to keep Sakura Hall open!
You look like you want to give us your signature!
You can do it, Sakura Hall!
Sorata-kun, give it your best shot!
I feel like I am on a school trip...
I thought I would have to come back later.
Ayano, what are you doing here?
Come on, it is the last spurt!
Kouhai-kun's Game Title Screening Last Day to Gather Signatures Graduation Ceremony
There were only a few more days we could spend like this...
Sensei, Aoyama does not seem to be feeling well,
so I will take her to the nurse's office.
You should go back to class.
Call me if you need anything, then.
Thanks for all your hard work.
The game title screening meeting is over.
Unfortunately, we did not make it this time.
It turns out a second music game...
had been submitted to the game title screening.
but it uses songs from a popular musical anime...
and Vocaloid songs popular on the internet.
It is a simple game following the system of previous music games,
but that title passed the screening meeting this time.
Are you saying that they do not need two music games?
Yes, that would be the main reason.
If I had moved through our meetings faster and submitted it...
to the game title screening sooner...
No, I am grateful for your help.
You made time for me even on your weekends off.
Thanks to you, I was able to work on my pitch.
I learned a lot from you.
You do not have to be so reasonable about it.
Your future is decided by forces beyond your power.
No matter how hard you work,
there are things you cannot change.
You do not have to accept things so easily.
But the world is full of such unfairness.
I will give you more information...
about the game title screening meeting at a later date.
Is there anything you would like to ask me right now?
What did you think of our pitch?
That is what I would like to know.
As a creator, I wanted to create a prototype.
As a user, I wanted to try playing it once.
It could have become an interesting game,
it could also have been a flat and terrible game.
I will call you again later.
There is nothing I can do about that.
What am I supposed to do about that?
Akasaka Ryunosuke No Subject How is Ponytail doing?
She said she was all right, so I left her to rest in the nurse's office.
Someone who is all right would not cry like that.
I was happy you worked so hard for Sakura Hall, for Shiina,
I was really happy you cared so much about Sakura Hall.
But you do not have to sacrifice yourself to this extent!
Do not talk about me like I am some kind of saint.
I have been making all kinds of excuses.
I have to think of Mashiro's feelings.
I will not cry in front of Kamiigusa-senpai and Mitaka-senpai.
afraid the last two years would go to waste.
That is why I prepared suitable excuses for Sakura Hall,
for Mashiro, and for Kamiigusa-senpai and Mitaka-senpai.
I did it so I would not get hurt.
I have only used excuses to pretend I am not hurting.
Do not tell me that makes you happy!
It was not kindness at all!
Thanks to you, I have been able to work hard for this long.
Because of you, I have managed to keep canvassing for signatures.
It is all thanks to you, Aoyama!
So you do not have to try so hard anymore, Aoyama!
Do not think of anything else anymore!
Stare the results of your audition in the face!
Do not run from it anymore!
I will listen to everything you have to say.
I have been patient this whole time!
When my friends went to karaoke or went shopping, I had work.
I endured all of it so I would not regret playing around or slacking off.
I even cut back on how much I spent...
I wanted to have fun, but...
I gave it everything I had, but...
If I fail the audition, it is not worth anything!
What were those two years worth?
Why was not I good enough?
You worked harder than anyone in the world.
That is not true at all.
That is not what I meant!
If you feel well enough to flirt, I guess you will be fine.
You have got a slight fever.
Take this, and get some rest.
Today's the last day, is not it?
So get some rest, and prepare yourself for the last push.
I bet you want him to sleep beside you.
You will have to tell him what you want by yourself, then.
Could you stay with me until I fall asleep?
I will stay until you wake up.
I will not know if you are alseep if I do not look at you.
I just got the results of the game title screening meeting.
I was only thinking of myself...
I failed, but I am glad I did it.
I am glad I failed the title screening.
I am not happy at all.
I feel like I would cry if I let my guard down.
I feel like I cannot take it anymore.
I need courage to try again,
but I am a coward now.
I cannot try again so soon, either.
So why do not you rest for now?
You have been working so hard.
I think it would do you good.
You can move forward once you have regained your strength.
You have been running this whole time.
It is fine if you take a little breather.
We are a little short of two-thirds of the student body, though.
We did not fall a little short.
I have not done everything I can!
Why did not you wake me?
Kanda, do not throw a fit.
You and Ponytail did a good job.
Besides, we felt sorry for you,
but we could not let Aoyama-san sleep alone.
Does not she need a partner-in-crime right now?
Is Aoyama-san still in the nurse's office?
Then, let us go get her!
How many more do we need?
I will get a lot, then.
Hall is going to be torn down,
and we do not have enough...
Let us throw a signature gathering...
and the night before the graduation ceremony party!
Request for Character Design Work for Our Company's Products
After seeing her fantastic illustrations for Rhythm Battler,
we would like to ask Shiina Mashiro-sama...
to design characters for our company's products...
who drew this to do some additional illustrations for us?
I think including more drawings would help us with the review board.
No matter what ordinary people try to do, it is no use.
No matter how much I want to catch up, it is still not enough.
Even if we give it everything we have, it is pointless.
Our hard work is never rewarded!
Even this business with Sakura Hall!
No matter how hard we tried,
there was nothing we could do!
We will all do it together.
I cannot call you by your first name in front of everyone.
Without realizing it, maybe I am trying to be formal.
